Chinese (Simplified): 来自你们友好的跨服部队！
又是一场韦斯特的演讲……

English: And you're a traitor to humanity.
Is against your right to think.

Chinese (Simplified): 对托比亚斯来说不够赚钱。

English: But who protects you from him?
Chinese (Simplified): 但谁来保护你免受他的伤害？

English: <Stand aside, I’m possessed by an ethos.>
<I feel like my head exploded and was reconstructed piece by piece.>
Chinese (Simplified): <感觉我的脑袋像爆炸了一样，然后一块块被重新拼凑起来。>

English: [HavenName] PA system is... malfunctioning. The security team that was sent to investigate is not responding. Get in the Comms room and find out what is going on!
Chinese (Simplified): [HavenName] 的广播系统……出现故障了。派去调查的安保队伍没有回应。赶快进入通讯室，查明情况！
这个新耶利哥士兵……状态不太对？

English: [OperativeName], don't take any chances! If [he/she] gets in your way, shoot [him/her].
Chinese (Simplified): [OperativeName]，别冒险！如果[他/她]挡路了，开枪！

English: The NJ troopers seem to be coming out of it, whatever it was.
Chinese (Simplified): 新耶利哥士兵似乎正在恢复，不管之前经历了什么。

English: Poor sods, sucks to be used like that.
Chinese (Simplified): 可怜的家伙，被那样利用真惨。

English: Hey, who is that? And is that an optical camo suit?
Chinese (Simplified): 嘿，那是谁？那是光学隐形服吗？

English: Don't let them get away! Shoot to kill!
Chinese (Simplified): 别让他们逃了！开枪击毙！

English: <[A screaming thought, reaching out] SUBMIT OR DIE>
Chinese (Simplified): <[一声尖叫的思维，伸出触手] 服从或死>

English: Get out of my head, you freak!
Director, we have encountered and neutralized a hostile psyonic operative.
Chinese (Simplified): 主任，我们遇到并已消灭一名敌对的心灵特工。

English: We terminated an unarmed individual wearing an advanced optical camouflage suit.
Chinese (Simplified): 我们击毙了一名穿着先进光学隐形服的无武装个体。
